Topic.Title: how do you disable the debugger?

Posts.EditableText: In QDK pro, you can compile a .cas file to hide your code, however it looks like the debugger still shows variables even when a .cas file is running. So if the programmer is not careful with variables the player might be able to debug the game and get hints that way. Just wondering if there is a fix for this maybe in the works for a future version or if there's a command or something to toggle debugging off.
